name: Imperfect control
description:
My submission to Roguelike Monthly Jam #1. In a dystopian world controlled by police bots, a strange controller is waiting on a junk heap...

Controls:

 WASD/Arrows to move (the robots(!))

Left click to progress the intro and restart

I made this game solo; I'm not artist, so please excuse my paint art and lack of textures, and I didn't get round to adding sound, so apologies there. I have plenty more ideas for this game that I didn't have time to implement in the jam, so I might add more to it later.
